content:
ANN: New version of https://www.npmjs.com/package/fhir-kit-client -- 1.4.0 See the CHANGELOG in the repo.

We are now using cross-fetch and have much better client-side support. Also we have a few popular framework examples (react, angular, react-native) in this repository: https://github.com/Vermonster/fhir-kit-client-examples.

Feedback welcome!
